definition: large sweet black or very dark purple edible aggregate fruit of any of various bushes of the genus Rubus, to pick or gather blackberries
details:
noun
- large sweet black or very dark purple edible aggregate fruit of any of various bushes of the genus Rubus
- bramble with sweet edible black or dark purple berries that usually do not separate from the receptacle
= synonyms: blackberry bush
verb
- to pick or gather blackberries
= example: to pick or gather blackberries
